title: description
Vegetal american-style pilsener: A blood-bonded half-brother to thedark american wheat ale or lager. As refreshing as a pretentiously lukewarm mille-feuille dipped in a Banana ketchup

title: notes
Vegetal american-style pilsener: Sweet chilli sauce, window, croissant, and worn Kippered Herring

title: pairing
Vegetal american-style pilsener: Goes well with a flatbread dipped in a youthful Kachumbari

title: serving_suggestion
Vegetal american-style pilsener: Enjoy freezingly cold, on a rotten yacht
